Changelog
=========

1.0 (2015-03-10)
----------------

- default to prefer html5

1.0b1 (2014-02-06)
------------------

- be a little more smart about detecting the iframe element


1.0a2 (2014-02-05)
------------------

- be smarter about parsing youtube urls


1.0a1 (2014-02-04)
------------------

- Initial release
